item.title: Jimik Blog #1
item.author: KnittingMaven@gmail.com (The Knitting Maven)
item.description: I enjoy knitting, especially sweaters, so much tha I would like to share my enjoyment of this hobby with you. Knitting has given me great joy. I hope to inspire you to enjoy knitting as well.
